statements: DELETE FROM email_open_rates WHERE email_id = 100 AND user_id = 200;
DELETE FROM click_through_rates WHERE user_id = 300 AND click_id = 500;
DELETE FROM EmailInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_recipients WHERE open_rate < 0.2 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM open_rates WHERE email_id = 1001 AND open_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Promotional' AND campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31';
